焸字的基本解释

焸
xiǒng
火光。

焸
yīng
明。

焸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǔ］
［《廣韻》公户切，上姥，見。］
亦作“焽1”。
人名用字。
[②]［yīng］
［《玉篇》於京切］
(1)明亮。
(2)用于人名。

焸字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　焸； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页675第16
【廣韻】公戸切，音古。人名。出漢書。　又【集韻】【類篇】?火迥切，音詗。火光。◎按焸爲火光。《字彙》《正字通》誤收入日部。《字彙》云：於驚切，音英。《正字通》云：譌字。俱非。

焸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
焸字的起名意思

火光。明。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [gǔ]
["Guangyun" public account cut, grandma, see you. ]
Also known as "焽1".
Use characters for names.
[②]［yīng］
["Jade Pian" cut in Beijing]
(1) Bright.
(2) Used for names.
焸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　焸; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 675 16
[Guangyun] Gongfu cut, sound ancient. Person's name. Published Han books.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Fire is very cut, sound is sing. Fire light. ◎Press 焸 for fire light. "Words" and "Zhengzitong" were mistakenly included in the Japanese Department. "Zihui" says: Yu Jingqie, Yinying. "Zhengzitong" says: "Zhao". Nothing.
